adventuregame.rooms module¶

class rooms.CaveExit(x, y)¶

Bases: rooms.RoomTile

The Room with which the game ends as soon as the player reaches it.

entry_text()¶

Prints an entry text whenever a room is entered.

modify_player(player)¶

Modifies the player depending on the room.

class rooms.DaggerRoom(x, y)¶

Bases: rooms.LootRoom

A LootRoom in which a Dagger can be found.

class rooms.EmptyRoom(x, y)¶

Bases: rooms.RoomTile

Default Room for empty rooms.

entry_text()¶

Prints an entry text whenever a room is entered.

Modifies the player depending on the room.

class rooms.EnemyRoom(x, y, enemy)¶

Bases: rooms.RoomTile

Superclass for Rooms with an enemy in it.

enemy (

obj:’Enemy’): The enemy object in this room.

available_actions()¶

Chooses the available actions depending on the enemy’s status.

modify_player(player)¶

Modifies the players Health Points from the attack of the enemy.

Adds the lootable item to the players inventory.

Prints an entry text whenever a room is entered.

class rooms.LootRoom(x, y, item)¶

Bases: rooms.RoomTile

Superclass for all Loot-Type rooms in which the player gains something

item (

obj:’Item’): The Item that is picked up in this room.

lootable¶

Bool that defines if the item has already been picked up or not.

Type

bool

add_loot(player)¶

Adds the lootable item to the players inventory.

modify_player(player)¶

If the item is still available, starts the add_loot method.

class rooms.OgreRoom(x, y)¶

Bases: rooms.EnemyRoom

EnemyRoom with an Ogre as enemy.

entry_text()¶

Prints an entry text whenever a room is entered.

class rooms.RoomTile(x, y)¶

Bases: object

Superclass for all the different rooms.

x¶

Room coordinate on the x-axis.

Type

int

y¶

Room coordinate on the y-axis.

Type

int

adjacent_moves()¶

Checks if there are adjacent RoomTiles to move to.

Returns

obj:’List’ of :obj:’Actions’): Returns possible moves that

can be made from this Room to another.

Return type

moves (

available_actions()¶

Returns all of the available actions in this room.

entry_text()¶

Prints an entry text whenever a room is entered.

modify_player(player)¶

Modifies the player depending on the room.
